sub_title: Group Leadership Communications | Renewi - a waste-to-product business ♻️
summary:
I am a people-focused marketing & communications professional that enjoys working in multidisciplinary projects that are transformational in a global and complex setting. I like to be busy with innovative topics and ideas. I start my work with the end-customer in mind and ensure consistent messaging across all channels while keeping the audience first.

I love to get stuff done and love marketing and communications that make a difference proven by data. I am best described with a can-do mentality.
 
Specialties: 
multilingual, fluent in German, English and Dutch, internal and external communications, leadership and change communications, employee engagement, digital marketing with focus on B2B (innovation, high-tech, sustainability), market research (qualitative & quantitative), social selling, customer experience, online journeys, marketing automation (Salesforce Pardot, SFDC), project management, certified scrum product owner, buyer persona research, resourceful team player with strong sense of responsibility

awards.title: Customer Experience Professional 2017
awards.description: Nominated out of 80 submissions based on my achievement to make an actual, concrete and practical customer experience plan.

awards.title: Honours Program
awards.description: Selected to participate in the university wide honours program as part of the best 5% of the Bachelor European Studies.

profile_positions.description:
Renewi is a leading waste to product company that gives new life to used materials every day. We have more than 6,800 employees working at 174 operating sites across Europe. Our extensive operational network means we are always close to our customers.

The result of our work is less waste and contamination, a smarter use of scarce raw materials, and a reduction in carbon emissions. This means that we are contributing towards a cleaner, circular world in which we “waste no more”.

In my role, I focus on strategic communications from a group level for all 5 divisions of Renewi. I work closely with the CEO on a strategic, tactical as well as operational level. My main focus is on leadership communications towards Renewi's senior leadership team as well as towards all people leaders. 

Next to that, I act as Communications Business Partner for sustainability within Renewi.

Some recent projects include a strategic communications approach for senior leadership towards continuous engagement, the re-design of people leader communications Renewi-wide focussing on an audience-first approach, and the first internal communications strategy for sustainability communications.
profile_positions.title: Group Leadership Communication Manager

profile_positions.description:
I act as the internal Communications Business Partner and have the responsibility for the overall program engagement for the enterprise-wide Innovation Transformation Program. 

I drive positive change in the way Philips innovates to become a customer-centric solutions provider. My engagement and communication strategy supports the transformation objectives and drives wide understanding and employee engagement around it. 

I orchestrate a team of communications professionals and work closely with the innovation leadership across the company and report directly into the Innovation & Strategy leadership team (reporting on Executive Committee level).
profile_positions.title: Program Engagement Lead Innovation Transformation

profile_positions.description:
As a Senior Digital Marketing Manager I develop the digital program strategy to manage user experience throughout the customer decision journey and ensure integration of relevant digital touch points for our B2B target audiences. Bridging the gap between Sales and Marketing is one of my core focus areas as well as working on strong communication concepts to support the customer experience. I did this for internal as well as external audiences.

In my role I am driving: 

► Clear and consistent stories on positioning & concept 
► Total planning & coordination of end-to-end marketing campaigns for all stakeholders
► Cooperation with our agencies to design, develop, deliver on activities & content along the marketing funnel 
► Online effectiveness and reporting directly to management level stakeholders
► Continuous professionalization of digital activities and presence

Next to my formal role I took up following responsibilities:

► Sr. Digital Marketing Mgr. a.i. for HealthSuite Digital Platforms (HSDP) (2020)
► Mentee lead Philips Women Lead "EmpowHER" (2020)
► Lead Sustainability Activate & Engage team (2020-2021)
profile_positions.title: Senior Digital Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description: As maternity cover I was responsible for the internal and external communication as well as digital marketing with focus on lead generation. I was leading a team of 5 communications and marketing professionals. During this time the new brand positioning of Philips Engineering Solutions was successfully launched.
profile_positions.title: Director Marketing, Communications & Digital a.i.

profile_positions.description:
I supported the Marketing & Digital team of Philips Innovation Services on an interim basis through my employment at Tech to Market. 

In my role as Digital Marketing Manager my main responsibility was the improvement of the effectiveness of the online marketing efforts. My work was strategic, tactical as well as hands-on operational on all touch points of the online customer decision journey.

Next to my daily role working on end-to-end marketing campaigns, my main projects included:

► Product owner new WordPress website (launch February 2017)
► Optimizing online performance reporting on management level KPI
► Project lead 'Sales in Digital times' (social selling & employee advocacy program)
► Product owner Salesforce Pardot marketing automation implementation (launch April 2018)
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Tech to Market provides strategic marketing and communications support to the segments industry, technology and education. Specialized in tech-marketing and international market development, whilst employing the latest digital marketing insights & automation tools. 
Tech to Market offers interim-, and digital transition-management for short-term projects, becoming a flexible extension of your marketing team for ongoing support, or delivering results as a full-service agency for on- and off-line marketing and communications projects. 

My projects included:

► Inhouse interim role as a Digital Marketing Manager -  Philips Innovation Services
► Project support for buyer persona research - EHV365
► Project support for buyer persona research - DSM
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Marketing & Communications

profile_positions.description:
Matchvertise B.V. is a fast growing business unit of the eHealth Ventures Group that deals with online marketing like SEO, SEA, affiliate and product management of its own e-commerce and web concepts, as well as the web shops for other companies.

Matchvertise B.V. is specialised in people healthcare marketing-, apps- and e-commerce solutions.

In my role as a Product Owner for the German speaking market, I reported directly to the management about agreed key performance indicators and managed projects regarding:

► Performance Marketing
► SEO, CRO & Usability
► E-Mail, Content and Social Media Marketing 
►Overall website strategy and specific campagnes 
► Introduction of new products and services
► Using tools like Google Analytics, Tableau, Excel, Channable, Sooqr and Jira
profile_positions.title: Online Marketing Specialist DACH

profile_positions.company: Ikwilvanmijnautoaf© - ik wil van mijn auto af
profile_positions.description:
Dealerdirect is the online carbroker for used vehicles in Europe. On websites like ikwilvanmijnautoaf.nl or ichwillmeinautoloswerden.de car owners can sell their used cars which are offered to a trusted network of over 8000 car dealers in the Netherlands, Germany and Belgium. In my position as an online marketeer I was mainly responsible for the German market but worked as well for the Dutch market. My main tasks were: 

► Search Engine Optimization of the B2C and B2B websites 
► Content Marketing (company blog, automobile news blog, guest blogging, reputation management)
► Social Media Marketing (Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Pinterest, Instagram, LinkedIn, Xing)
► Analyzing of the current strategy and develop new approaches (using tools like Google Analytics)
► Support online public relations (press releases, online pr campaigns)
► E-Mail Marketing (B2C and B2B)
► Designing promotional materials (flyer and broschures for trade fairs as well as direct mailings)
► Translating Dutch / German
profile_positions.title: Online Marketing & Communication Specialist Germany

profile_positions.description:
Eduvision is providing high-end trainings in the areas of IT & New Media to employees of multinational companys, SMEs and government institutions. As marketing & sales manager for the D-A-CH division of Eduvision I was responsible for:

► Sales (account manager for B2B contacts in Germany, Austria & Switzerland)
► Online Marketing (Google Analytics, SEO, SEA, E-Mail Marketing, website strategy, giving webinars & recording tutorials, write blogs & whitepapers)
► Market research & development 
► External communication & marketing strategy
► Translating Dutch-German and copywriting for promotional material
profile_positions.title: Marketing & Sales DACH

profile_positions.description:
VentureLab International offers a research-based, business development programme. Our clients are -mostly- technologybased start-ups and established firms that want to accelerate their business growth. During my master thesis project I was:

► Conducting quantitative research (using online surveys and analyze data with SPSS)
► Dealing with internationalization decisions of Dutch entrepreneurs
► International entrepreneurship theory and praxis

Finished my research project with the grade 8.
profile_positions.title: Research student (master thesis)

profile_positions.description:
The German-Dutch Chamber of Commerce is engaged in various bilateral projects in order to promote trade and exchange between the countries. During my internship I was supporting the export consultants in the marketing department by: 

► Conducting market research (two projects, utility market in Germany and FMCG industry in Germany) 
► Organize events and trade missions (E-world energy & water, bilateral meeting on bioplastics)
►Give export advice to Dutch/German companies (various sectors: renewable energy, security products, innovative software products) 
► Create business contacts (cold & warm aquisition)
► Prepare company profiles
profile_positions.title: Marketing (internship)

profile_positions.description:
Metropost is a privatly owned postal company providing services in the Twente region. My tasks as a student employee were various, but can mainly be described by:

► Support the general manager
► Assist in marketing projects
profile_positions.title: Assistant to the Manager
